title: SMC_CNC_REF (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_CNC_REF
This function block manages the parsed G-code files.

rows.Name: wCNCREFStructID
rows.Comment:
The fix value ofwCNCREFStructIDallows the module to check
internally if the consigned structure variable is of typeSMC_CNC_REF.

rows:
In case of jumps implemented within the IEC program (G20),bRestartwill be set bySMC_NCDecoderin order to cause the
generator of the data structure to reinitialize all pointers
and to regenerate the data structure.
The jump target (sentence number); only valid, ifbRestart=TRUE;
Pointer on first structure of typeSMC_GCODE_WORD.

If the input isTRUE,
the function block is maintained by managers.
Set by the programming system, when it creates an instance.
IfTRUE, no further data is supposed to be appended
